headline: How Investors Are Reacting To AES (AES) Settlement Limiting Rate Hikes in Indianapolis Through 2030
summary: Earlier this month, AES Indiana reached a settlement agreement with the City of Indianapolis and other stakeholders to reduce its proposed electricity rate hike for over 500,000 customers and delay any further base rate increases until at least 2030, pending final approval by state regulators. This development follows extensive public and political opposition, as well as concessions from AES Indiana not to recover about US$47 million in uncollected expenses related to billing system issues,...

headline: Investment firm reportedly poised to purchase company behind Santa Fe solar project
summary: An infrastructure investment firm owned by massive asset manager BlackRock reportedly plans to acquire AES Corp., the northern Virginia-based energy giant behind the Rancho Viejo Solar project. It is unclear when the potential deal would be done. Citing people briefed on the matter, the Financial Times reported in early October that Global Infrastructure Partners, known for and utility ...
